score: 1 out of 3 people found the following review useful
review: Desert Blue is a pretty good/funny/ sometimes sad movie. Christina was the best, she was my favorite character. The soundtrack was good and so was most of the acting. Some of the whole coca cola stuff was pretty stupid yet funny 8/10
